checklists-confirm-change-status: Text in confirm dialog for user to be sure that new revision of the page should be created
checklists-not-allowed: Text for error if checklist is identified on a not supported page
checklists-checkbox-dlg-hide-revision-la: Label for checkbox to set preference that dialog with reminder for new revision should not be shown anymore
checklists-droplet-checklist-title: Label for card which describes insertion of a checklist
checklists-droplet-checklist-description: Label for card which describes insertion of a checklist
